author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
At the @metmuseum, Adam Savage gets to experience something he's always dreamed of: holding a REAL samurai sword. Conservator and armorer Ted Hunter takes us through the anatomy of this exquisite 17th century sword, truly a spectacular piece of art and engineering. Don't miss Adam literally at a loss for words!  

The MET's Arms and Armor Department: https://www.metmuseum.org/about-the-met/collection-areas/arms-and-armor
The Met Museum: https://www.metmuseum.org/
Playlist of our  @metmuseum  videos: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLJtitKU0CAeiUv8endzt93QO2_T96n_xe
Adam Marvels Over Centuries-Old Samurai Sword Tsuba: https://youtu.be/9DqJENTRTRk
dam Savage Meets Real Armored Gauntlets: https://youtu.be/59-9PlB-F1Y
Adam Savage Tours Samurai Helmets! https://youtu.be/aX023WWlH_A
Amazing (and REAL) Medieval Full-Face Helmets! https://youtu.be/yS3TtXkhnjQ
Adam Savage Tours Medieval Crossbows: https://youtu.be/zretcxDkU1I

title: Adam Savage Handles a REAL Samurai Sword!
